website_summaries.verdict: If you miss having a zoom lens, but don't want to add too much bulk and weight to your travels, the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX300 is a very good choice.
pros: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX300 is currently the lightest, smallest camera with a 20x zoom.
It has built-in Wi-Fi for on-the-go sharing (among other things)
and a large variety of auto shooting options
cons: The camera's weight and size can make it difficult to keep steady when using the zoom lens, the screen is difficult to see in bright sun, and the lens has small apertures at both ends, making the zoom best suited for daytime, outdoor use

customer_reviews.title: Great Photos from Compact Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been a great replacement for my old Point-and-Shoot. I like to have a camera separate from my telephone camera, and this one works well and takes great shots. My husband and I recently went to Niagara Falls and were able to get incredible photos and movies with this inexpensive camera. It even took great night shots when the Falls were lighted. Our photos and movies were much better than those of a friend who also traveled to Niagara Falls recently and used an expensive camera than is big and bulky. I love that this can slide into my pocket and I don't have to worry about dragging around big equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Scfi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Good quality and features. Yes - I am a bit old fashion by believing in a separate device for making photos. And yes - it is an extra device to be dragged around. However, you can not argue that it produces better quality images when comparing to a phone cameras. I am not a professional photographer, so this small product is more than adequate for me.
customer_reviews.author: D opinion

customer_reviews.title: Camera delivers on all promises
customer_reviews.text: We had to buy a new camera when our Sony DSC-H70 did not work any more due to a small piece of plastic from the memory stick getting stuck inside. Looking at various reviews we finally settled on the WX300 even though it cost a little more than we originally wanted to spend. After our cruise of the Baltic followed by a two week trip through Germany resulting in about 2,500 pictures I can say that this camera takes very good pictures in any condition including low light; it's amazing what you can see when you utilize maximum zoom. I can strongly recommend this camera
customer_reviews.author: Arno Hoerschgens

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera for my money!
customer_reviews.text: The is a power house of engineering for outstanding pictures with long distance shots. The lens magnification out performed the other cameras on display that cost hundreds of dollars more and is very compact and easy to carry and have at the ready to capture those action shots as they are happening, not after having to dig out a large camera from it's case with an equally long heavy lens attached. The controls are well marked and easy to adjust or just leave it on automatic and still get great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!  I bought 3!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for camera with good zoom capability and high quality photos. I had no idea it would be so rich in features and capabilities until I got it out of the box and reviewed the User manual. Wifi. Movies. Great pictures. Awesome zoom. I went to a conference and took pictures of speakers from the back of the room with the zoom - you'd think I was 5 feet away looking at the pictures! I bought this white camera for my wife, a red one for my daughter, and a black one for myself - I like that we all have the same great camera but we can tell which camera belongs to who! Well done Sony!
customer_reviews.author: scottrhayesdb2

customer_reviews.title: Leader in its class
customer_reviews.text: While being a big fan of Nikon, I bought this Sony Digital camera for sudden needs of pictures. I am happy with the quality of the photos taken. Its real pocket sized and very luxurious design. Someone already included detail review I liked that very much. Only complain I have now, is zoom stuck so often. Its closing to end I guess. Not 5 stars because I expected little more years. I define this one as perfect family camera or holiday camera. Its not rugged so asks for more care.
customer_reviews.author: Aruna

customer_reviews.title: Good photos, sloooooowwww processing
customer_reviews.text: Photos are good, but unless on rapid shoot it takes seconds to process. And I haven't (to date) found a way to control how to choose the focus options. For extended zoom (as expected) you will need a steady rest. Small enough to fit in a pocket and light enough to not be bulky. If I had known of the processing issue, I would not have purchased. I use it for quick nature shots and nature won't always hold the pose.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: The photo quality is a great improvement to a previous Sony model I had
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been by my side for years. The charge lasts for weeks on trips. The photo quality is a great improvement to a previous Sony model I had. The only complaint i have is that it's not great in low-light without flash and the camera is relatively delicate and must be handled carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie H.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very impressed and happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! I'm still learning all the features, but it takes beautiful photos. The telephoto lens is amazing for this little camera! The wifi feature works pretty good, but I've had some problems trying to download multiple pictures at one time. It also won't download videos to my iPad, but I'm still learning how to use all the (many, many) features this camera offers. I've had several people ask for the brand and model so they could buy one too after they saw what results I got from this camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. Short

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I own an SLR Cannon, but there were times when i didn't want to carry the bag and all the extra lenses, accessories, etc. So i went researching a good Point and Shoot...and came across the reviews on this one, so i decided to give it a try. The camera itself is beautiful, compact and packed with features. The 20x optical lens is top! and the included image stabilizer has proven to be a great feature for me [as my hands do shake a little] The quality fo the photes are super sharp and high definition! Amazon was nice to give me a Free carrying case at the time i bought it. LOVE IT>
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Martínez

customer_reviews.title: Wrong USB Cable means no recharging batteries, no ability to set-up Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy both with the wrong USB cable limiting me on my extended trip and forcing me to spend money on batteries and to search for a USB Cable that will work (my cellphone, tablet and other charger cables don't fit either). Also unhappy with photos. They are all dark. I've tried working with various settings but nothing seems to help. The display is also nearly impossible to see in bright sunlight. I would not buy this camera again. I can't return it because I'm 2,000 miles from home.
customer_reviews.author: VT Gal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for when I simply cant lug around my DSLR. Shutter speed is lightning fast. Solid construction so I'm not worried about throwing it in my pocket. The zoom works extremely well. It doesn't have the same amount of options that my DSLR has but lets face it, when I need to tweak things or swap lenses then I just bring my DSLR. This camera is for the shots you would have missed anyway because your camera is sitting at home.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Zoom Camera
customer_reviews.text: Always buy Sony cameras because of quality pictures. This camera is great because of its small size. I hike a lot and like to have a camera that is accessible quickly so when a picture moment comes up it is easy to point and shoot. You can carry it in a shirt pocket or camera case because it is light weoght. Only negative comment on this camera is the location where you plug in the USB cord. You open a small door in the corner of the camera and have to work a little to insert the cord. This was not well thought out by designers.
customer_reviews.author: Dave 1420

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for a trip to Honduras. It's not so easy to transfer the photos to a smart phone. (In my case I transfer them to my Kindle.) Sometimes it works right away and other times I have tried it many times during a 30 minute time period. I do love the photos it takes. I still haven't learned all the tricks and I'm sure in time I will be able to do much more with the camera. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SMARTAMAZONWOMAN

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I love it so much, I bought it a second time when my first one broke due to my daughter spilling milk on it. It takes awesome pictures and works really well in low light without a flash, which was important to me. Now I can't find this one... I think the milk monster stole it. I sure hope I don't have to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole H.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the lens cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice small camera. Good photos. Very little shutter lag but significant lag as images are being stored. Good battery life. My biggest complaint with this camera, the reason I had to quit using it, is that the thin metal surrounding the lens is flimsy. By wearing this camera in a small bag on my belt while driving, this metal was pushed in by pressure from my seatbelt. This in turn, caused the thin metal leaves of the lens cover mechanism to stick, leaving the lens itself exposed. The lens coating eventually was damaged by my repeatedly manually moving this lens cover out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Kent V.

customer_reviews.title: Takes good pictures, battery lasts for days
customer_reviews.text: Takes good pictures, battery lasts for days. Not the greatest in low light if you are avoiding using the flash, but for day light it works very well. Body seems sturdy and stood up to two weeks of day hiking without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E

customer_reviews.title: I took it on a cruise to Hawaii and the pictures were very nice. We were at a luau at night and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for awhile now. I took it on a cruise to Hawaii and the pictures were very nice. We were at a luau at night and I was quite a few yards from the stage with no surrounding light. I was astounded at how great the video footage was. However, as I've experienced many times, you definitely need a pretty steady hand or tripod for a camera this small. Otherwise, it's a great camera!
customer_reviews.author: J-NICE

customer_reviews.title: The WX300/B augments my Sony A65 and it's one of the finest cameras I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first Sony product in 1962...a Tapecorder 101 (it still works) and have been a Sony fan ever since. The WX300/B augments my Sony A65 and it's one of the finest cameras I have ever bought. Set it to "P" and there's no limit to the excellent photos you will shoot. It's small size is perfect, even in its own semi-hard shell case. In a word, it's terrific!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Wayne

customer_reviews.title: A fun compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I have a Sony NEX5 which is a wonderful camera but for my purposes I wanted a camera to be able to carry in my shirt pocket. The Sony WX300 seemed to fit the bill and although I haven't used it extensively yet, it is proving to be versatile, convenient and takes sharp, high definition photos in any light conditions. It is fun to use and its wi-fi feature makes for an easy download to a computer. For a compact camera, its telephoto capability is amazing. In 4 words, I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bullet

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-WX300/R
customer_reviews.text: Finally I've come home to Sony. My first digital camera was a Sony and I loved it. Under pressure from a salesperson I bought a Canon. While the photos were okay, nothing compared to my Sony. I researched and bought my new camera right before a family vacation hoping it would take good photos. This camera fits in your pocket. It's smaller than my iphone. It's got a 20X zoom and gives you 18 MP. Didn't think a camera that small could produce such quality photos. But it does!!! Sorry I waited so long to get back to Sony. I won't ever use another brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda 59

customer_reviews.title: So good even a 9 year old can take great photos!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for the whole family but it is used mostly by my nine year old, who wants to make movies when she grows up. She was able to figure it out in no time. The video and photo quality is by far the best of all the digital cameras we have owned. It takes great movies, and the panoramic feature is fun, too. I have not had a bad photo with this little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I have ever bought. I take a lot of photos when I travel, between 200 and 1000 a day. So I wear out cameras fairly quickly and buy replacements. I have bought cheaper ones and more expensive ones, but this is my favorite camera I have ever bought. The 20x zoom is fantastic. It turns on quickly and takes great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-WX300/B Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and great camera. It took some time to get acquainted with the new item but it is a quality product from the best Digital Camera manufacturer on the market. Reasonably priced and easy to operate. Still learning the intricacies of the camera but I have owned Sony Digitals from Amazon.Com for nearly 15 years now. Great product to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: SGBaker

customer_reviews.title: The little camera that does!
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts long, fantastic stills and video with superb image stabilization. Really a fantastic feature set packed into a real pocket sized camera...what's not to love! Took about 500 photos, 5 Full-HD videos (about 2min a piece) over a month and a half in Europe...didn't charge it once. I'm blown away by this little beast!
customer_reviews.author: saladdin

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: The lens extends so far that it actually casts a shadow on your subject if it is closer than about 12-15 feet. I thought I was covering the flash with a finger until I tested it. Otherwise, it is the best camera we've owned and we buy a new camera about every 3 years. I also purchased a 64Gb card which was worth every penny. Battery life is excellent, zoom is phenominal.
customer_reviews.author: RSG

customer_reviews.title: I cannot put it down
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about a 20 power for such a small camera. I took it to the beach and I could not believe how clear some of the telephoto pictures I took. I have been using it to photograph the hummingbirds in the back yard. I continue to be amazed at the quality of photo. I am not one for big expensive cameras so this is perfect. I have owned Olympus and Canon but this beats them both.
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Good camera; cool features
customer_reviews.text: I am just loving how even relatively inexpensive cameras can take shots amateurs only dreamed of not 10 years ago. Compact but not featureless by any stretch. Downside: no viewfinder, which I didn't think I'd miss until I starting shooting in bright daylight, where the screen is almost useless. Other than that, a great little camera. Haven't used the wifi yet but that looks like a most useful feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cady

customer_reviews.title: I shopped til I dropped
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed several cameras before finally deciding on the Sony DSC-WX300/B. All the functions that I wanted are easy to use and the results are spectacular. This camera practically shoots itself. The long zoom is especially handy. We used it at our son's Navy Recruit Training Graduation in Great Lakes and although we were in the balcony we could see him as clearly as if he was 3 feet away! The battery charge seems to last forever! I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou C

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: My brother in law received this same camera for his BDay last summer and ever since, my wife, has wanted this to replace her 5 year old Panasonic. The portability for all the concerts we go to will be great, the 20x optical zoom is amazing, especially for a camera this size. I am not a camera geek so I don't know a lot about photography, but the price is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Brett A.

customer_reviews.title: Best. Camera I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I took it to Mexico on vacation and have the BEST pictures, very clear and the wifi function allowed me to load pics from my camera to my iPad daily so I could be sure to have copies on my cloud in case something happened to the camera (theft, damage). The recommended waterproof case doesn't fit the camera so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: C28

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera a lot. I'm not a professional photographer but I love to take cameras wherever I go and this one is the perfect size for a coat or pant pocket. I don't really like the position of the zoom button - seems too close to the settings button, but takes great pictures and great video. Would highly recommend if you enjoy an easy, good, dependable camera
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Young

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! It is the best camera I have owned so far and I mostly love it's size. It's not great for big hands but it is small enough to hold and take the picture with one hand. Takes great night pictures once you figure it out. I also love the extra functions like high-lighting only certain colors and everything else is black and white. It has created some very creative pictures.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera for travelers. It's small enough to fit in your purse or pocket. It makes great shots. The zoom lens is powerful and the anti-shake feature really helps for taking photos "on the fly." Video capability is an added plus. It's easy to upload photos through your Smartphone. I'm glad I bought it--it's a very handy little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Zhezahn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera! For $200 it is a great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! For $200 it is a great bargain, and easily replaced my old Canon still-shot and Canon HD camcorder, and is smaller than both. Zoom is better and quality at least as good, and the convenience was the real kicker as it's so much easier to take around.
customer_reviews.author: RealitySlap

customer_reviews.title: Best compact yet!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replaced my Canon Cybershot which had grainy and blurry indoor pictures. Let me tell you this camera blew me out of the water. Fabulous indoor pictures with no flash! 20X optical zoom is amazing and pictures come out amazing both indoor and outdoor. Just leave setting on Auto and enjoy snapping away. 100% satisfied. But just get a rubber case since the camera is thin and a bit slick. So far I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Invest4life

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for pictures, not as good for video.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera as a compromise with my husband instead of getting a DSLR. It takes great quality pictures and quicker than our previous camera which is a must-have feature, in my opinion. When using the video setting, it is easy to cover the microphone and the lighting seems to get darker but overall I am pleased with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Rae Day

customer_reviews.title: Great for pictures that will be uploaded to facebook.
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera as an extension of my iPhone's camera. The quality is not on par (or even close) to a DSLR, but the pictures are more than sufficient for use on the internet. WiFi connectivity is nice and really simple to setup. Video is on par with dedicated video cameras I have owned in the past. Basically just a really fun camera for those times when you need to zoom in on a situation.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this little camera. Purchased to replace an earlier version (finally wore out). This model has a much larger viewing window without making the camera larger. Takes excellent pictures and is very easy to use the menu. Have used this camera countless times even though I own a high end 35mm.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this sony after our old cannon bit the dust. Small size takes some getting used to. Takes great pictures, zoom is especially impressive, we were at a show yesterday, sitting about 200' back from the stage and I was able to zoom in and take good low light pictures without the flash. Image stabilization works very well. Many different "scene" modes, including a panorama mode that actually works pretty well. A lot of features in a small package. I was also able to use the WiFi feature to connect to my IPad and download pictures pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Fagley

customer_reviews.title: Nice little second camera
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this awhile now and I love this camera, I take it everywhere the big camera would have trouble taking. We go kayaking, swimming, biking, hiking and walking with this little guy. since it was not costly we do not fear breaking or losing it. I am very happy with the results as well.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Atchley

customer_reviews.title: Picture almost too bright
customer_reviews.text: I must admit that I need to spend some time figuring out how to use this camera properly. I've had it for a couple days and the automatic mode pictures seem almost too bright. One the plus side if this extra brightness, I took a picture in the dark and the photo came out as though there was perfect lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Reflection

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. I strayed away from Sony point and shoots a few years ago and went with a Canon, bad move. While I love my Canon DSLR, their compacts leave something to be desired. This is a great camera, takes amazing pics and video. Love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Frame

customer_reviews.title: Great Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: So far, this camera has met my expectations. I bought it for the long optical zoom and the wifi capability, and those have both worked well. I've only had it a couple of weeks, so I haven't had a chance to try it in program mode, which is how I would like to use it more, but the automatic settings have been fine. My only concern is the lens cover. I wish I could carry it without a case in my pocket, but after touching the front accidentally and seeing the hinged lid covering open up, I don't dare do that. For the price, it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: BC EchoHawk

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Sony model, but it was about 3 years old. It didn't have all the features (no panorama, WiFi connectivity, only 12 MP, 3x zoom etc.). This camera is smaller than the older one. I've only used it a few times, but the photos it takes are outstanding. I can't wait to try it in low-light settings.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: easy to carry , fits in the palm of my hand. great day shots as well as evening. do have to understand features on camera to get the best possible pics. also easy to use. if your looking for one of a kind perfect photos this camera is good for memories shots only with good quality. If you want that detailed shot get more expensive camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dwifenunez

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I juts bought this camera for my parents after my own purchase 6 months ago. I particularly like the optical 20x zoom which makes a great difference with electronic zooms. I like the light weight and the large screen on the back. Only one negative, i find it a bit slow to take a picture. I don't have any comparison so this is a feedback on an absolute basis. I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: BFJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for its size.
customer_reviews.text: Dropped it ocean. It's dead. I miss it. Great zoom and I loved the stitching. Very small controls however. Wifi was a pain in the ass and slow.
customer_reviews.author: Galoolie

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera.
customer_reviews.text: A well built quality camera at a reasonable price. It's small enough to fit in a pocket, but not too small to handle. There are only two problems: Indoors the flash tends to leave a shadow behind your subject; and you have to be careful not to cover the flash with your finger.
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: This a very attractive camera and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This a very attractive camera and easy to use. It has many picture functions and the video is easy to use. It stores a lot of pictures and videos on the easy to insert cards. It is economical for what you get too.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Small, Light and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Small, Light and Powerful I take my camera everywhere I go, just tuck it in my pants pocket and if I need to take a picture it's there. I love to take pictures but I don't want a large camera hanging around my neck. This little camera is equivalent to a 500 mm zoom all you'll ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Joelee

customer_reviews.title: Quite Nice camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for our upcoming vacation to the Grand Canyon. Takes good quality pictures, and the video quality seems good enough, too. It' a solid little camera, heavier than I expected. I bought the battery charger for it and 3 extra batteries. Don't want to miss out on anything when we're rafting down the colorado river.
customer_reviews.author: NawlinsPicker

customer_reviews.title: Compact, good zoom and super clear HD video
customer_reviews.text: Camera is really compact, fits to your pocket. Pictures quality is good, especially the stabilty shots which captures multiple shots for a free hand night shot. Video is crisp and clear and good quality for HDTV. Panaromic sweep is really cool and quick. Wi-Fi is a cool feature to transfer or view pictures. Good one among the Canon and the Nikon point and shoots that are available across the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Vinod

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it, but just OK
customer_reviews.text: I have a really nice Sony and wanted this as a purse backup on my trip to SE Asia. I used it about 3 times, didn't really like the quality of the pix, but now I have it in my car, so I'm happy. Can't keep my good camera in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this camera except it doesn't take pictures well with moving objects.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: A very good camera
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use camera that fits in my pocket that I can take anywhere without having to strap it around my neck or carry it in a box. At the same time, offers very nice quality pictures indoors and outdoors. Comfortable to hold and shoot pics. Packaging and delivery were good by the seller. Have been using it for about 5 months now and haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Docsnore

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good travel camera that would take crystal clear video and pictures. I previously owned a Sony camera and loved it, that camera grew old so I decided to purchase this brand again. I researched a lot and finally decided for this one. The settings are fairly easy, pictures are very clear and has different scene modes. It's very lightweight and can be carried in a pocket (which I don't recommend). it records full 1080HD and the sound is very clear as well. I am in love with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Roman

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Small size, takes great pictures, easy to use and has a fantastic zoom lens. I wish it had a different battery charging system like my old Panasonic but other than that it is a great camera. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Theuer

customer_reviews.title: Best in Class
customer_reviews.text: Best camera in its class...and a little outside its class. Wife took it to a Beyoncé concert and you'd swear she was a professional. The video and screenshots looked like something out of a magazine. Slides in your pocket, takes great Hi Def pics, and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Julian S.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I liked the camera. I wanted a point and shoot but this camera offers much more. Light weight but I did not realize that a photo card did not come with the camera so at the last minute I was out buying a photo card.
customer_reviews.author: sweetpinmagnolia

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE THIS CYBER SHOT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: WE'VE OWNED MANY SONY CYBER SHOT CAMERAS AND THEY SEEM TO GET BETTER AND BETTER. BEST PART IS THE ZOOM CAPABILITY AND THE COMPACT SIZE ALLOWS YOU CARRY IN YOUR POCKET OR PURSE. NO NEED FOR BIG BULKY CAMERA BAGS. I DON'T THINK IT'S EVER TAKEN A BAD PICTURE. THE WIFI I DON'T USE SO CAN'T COMMENT.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Did not have crisp pictures and broke just after a year anyway...
customer_reviews.text: The images are not as clear as my older Samsung camera. And at 13 months it had a very short fall (less than 2 feet) and fell on the front case and now the lens does not open. I brought it to a local camera shop and the two sales people told me that they had seen this as an issue many times a short drop bent part of the opening mechanism on the lens - they quoted me a repair price but I opted to buy the updated version on my Canon Elph which had much better pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera packs a big wallop for it's size. Gives you a great zoom, we have gotten great shots of hummingbirds visiting our feeder. Great for travel, or anytime you want a small camera that will give you more than your phone does.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Braun

customer_reviews.title: Got a great deal on an "Open Box" camera
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal on an "Open Box" camera. It is like new and seems to function perfectly. Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: D in Sea

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi connection to computer to upload pictures and you can also upload to a smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding small camera with lots of neat features. About the size of a deck of cards with a 20 power optical zoom. Wi-Fi connection to computer to upload pictures and you can also upload to a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Block

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use - great pictures. I worry about the lens cover not closing ( I had that problem with the Coolpix I had and it costs as much as the camera to fix it) but seems to be working fine. Took 1,000 pics in Italy with little or no issues re: blurring in low light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning buyer

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-WX300/B 18 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: The price was great for the value of the Product. The special features with the camera including the telephoto, panaromic pictures and qulity of the lens are fantastic. The compact size is great for day in and day out carring as well as when you go for a tour. I am very happy with this camera. I strongly recommand to friends who like to buy a point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: edwin cheung

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera for a beginner. Very easy to use. Love the big screen! Love the feature that allows for auto - adjustment. Sometimes it takes a little long to process the pics tho, which means I have to wait to take the next pic. This is an inconvenience if you're taking live action shots.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lynn Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera in a small size
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd model camera I bought for my wife and now for my wife' niece a great compact camera with BIG features I Highly recommend. This item a lot ,you can really grow with This camera
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. Fits in my purse and takes excellent photos and video. Quality is superb. Easy functionality and user friendly. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SMRTME1979

customer_reviews.title: Quite the little powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I got this for Christmas. She has yet to put it down. In the three months or less that we have had it, she has taken probably more than 1000 pictures. It's that good. The zoom is amazing. The pictures come out crystal clear and so detailed. Worth buying if you are in the market for a small but powerful device.
customer_reviews.author: steve kiddy

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is just OK
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera with a lot of cool settings. But my old bulky Kodak gives me much better quality . Tried to replace it numerous amount of times, but nothing can compete
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a digital SLR and decided to buy a more compact camera in case I don't want to lug around the it around. I find I use this camera more often because of it's size, picture quality and versatility. The HD video is great the play back is fantastic and even records in stereo. Plus it has a 20x optical zoom. I may never pickup the big guy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera. Once I updated the software app on ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera. Once I updated the software app on my tablet and phone, I linked the camera to my android phone. Now pics can instantly be sent to my phone...and the photo clarity is A1.
customer_reviews.author: Heft

customer_reviews.title: Great camera as usual
customer_reviews.text: My favorite camera, I have bought Cybershots for years. My ONLY complaint is that where I hold it to take a pic, my finger blocks the flash now. Other than that, it's excellent!
customer_reviews.author: FrazierDave

customer_reviews.title: I loooovvvveeee this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is everything you could ask for and more. It came with a free compact camera case and the quality of photos is amazing. The wifi feature actually works and itsn't difficult to use at all. It is extremely convenient being able to snap photos and send them to the recipients as you go. I rarely connect the camera to my computer for anything outside of backing up photos. Easy to use. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: the person love it. I think it is a relally good ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, the person love it. I think it is a relally good option, especially for the size, MP and zoom. I would buy this if I needed a camera for traveling or just taking casual pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Manuel Monsalve Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality and features are awesome. It's very easy and fast to switch between different modes.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchie

customer_reviews.title: Snappy little camera
customer_reviews.text: The great advantage of this camera is its 20X zoom. It is light and good looking although a bit tinny to the touch. Otherwise it has all the great advantages of the Sony make and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: illy billy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used pocket sized cameras that are way better in quality.
customer_reviews.author: The Bunch Family

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera. It's reasonably priced, compact and easy to use. I would recommend this camera to anyone. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Xjerzgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Filled up 2 8gb already. Great, low light. Great zoom. There are better cameras for macros/close ups. Sharp daytime pictures. Battery is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Myris

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm planning on taking this camera to Europe and just testing it around my house it seems pretty awesome. Great zoom and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: JMU_Fan

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the ease of use and resulting photographs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older model. I'm very pleased with the ease of use and resulting photographs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nolin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - best autofocus camera I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: After 14 years of owning digital cameras, I have finally discovered a suitable autofocus camera in subcompact form that consistently takes quality photos in almost all conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Abruzzi

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: took some really awesome pics from far away. my friend thought I was much closer than the pics lead them to believe and the quality was amazing!! :D
customer_reviews.author: jupiter0342

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera! Highly recommend :-) Love everything about it! Color, functionality! Clarity of photos! And the battery lasts forever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: UnlimitedPotentialUSA

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-WX300 camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera exceeded my expectations. The quality is precise, picture quality is terrific. I would recommend it to anyone who needs portability and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd J. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great pics only hard to see thru the view finder when you are out in the sun..Easy to use! Zoom is terrific and pics are really clear. Love this camera
customer_reviews.author: Pat S.

customer_reviews.title: compact and light
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous cybershot that I loved. This one is smaller and lighter but has a stronger zoom. Very easy to carry in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ingwerson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT camera!
customer_reviews.text: In just got back from the cruise I especially bought this camera for. It is always a pleasant surprise when the result is better than you expect. I still have more to learn about it but on auto it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: David Hull

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace the cybershot this was a great upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah this camera captures not only memories but high quality images too.
customer_reviews.author: Applesauce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is excellent. Great quality pictures and nice zoom features. The wireless connection to Android or iPhone (iPad) is noce, but a clunky interface and very slow response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hate the limited video options and that pica doesn't recognize ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate the limited video options and that picasa doesn't recognize either formats. It takes nice pictures but sometimes is slow to shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Tim from Maine.

customer_reviews.title: It was nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It was nice while it lasted. Haven't even had it six months and it stopped working.Won't even turn on. Have only take 52 pictures with it and they were taken at home so the camera was never carried a pocket or anywhere where damage could be done There is no reason for it not to turn on. Thought maybe it needed to be charged so plugged it in but it won't even charge. Now I have to send it to Sony for a repair and I have to pay for shipping it to them. Just not right. Won't ever buy a Sony again.
customer_reviews.author: Helga

customer_reviews.title: Great camera good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice Little camera and easy to use...takes great pictures. would recommend to anyone who is looking for a new camera
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: Great cam for it price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent image quality and zoom. Great performance, good for indoor and outdoor. Adjustment of settings could be a little bit complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera that takes wonderful pictures and video at a very reasonable price. It was fairly easy to understand the functions, and you can look up anything you need to know, about how to use the camera, directly in the menu.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Takes excellent pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, take exceptional pictures especially in low light. Videos are good, very compact and great battery life. Love all the features. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Henry Marzuchowski

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing zoom, and fast shutter. Very easy to use, even the auto setting photos are clear and bright. Really enjoy the wi-fi photo sharing
customer_reviews.author: Zahavah

product_meta.title: Sony DSC-WX300/B 18.2 MP Digital Camera with 20x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3-Inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackCapture landscapes with one touch using Sweep Panorama, get that perfect portrait with Smile Shutter, snap wider scenes.

In The Box 

 * Rechargeable Battery Pack NP-BX1
 * AC AdaptorAC-UB10
 * Micro USB cable
 * Wrist Strap
 * Instruction Manual



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 A+ DSCWX300 





Bring the action ultra-close with a remarkable, 20x zoom ultra-compact camera. Plus, share pics and video easily to Facebook and more with wireless transfer to your smartphone or tablet. Easily shoot all day with battery to spare with up to 500 photos per charge. 20x optical zoom
plus 40x Clear Image
Digital Zoom 18.2MP images and high speed AF even in low-light WiFi sharing to upload photos and videos


Technology Get close with 20x zoom Zoom in super close for great sports, travel, and wildlife photos. The WX300 boasts 20x optical zoom plus 40x Clear Image Digital Zoom technology to bring you near enough to capture distant details. A powerful processor reduces graininess for crisper, higher-quality close-ups. Pixel Power With a 18.2-megapixel Exmor® R CMOS sensor, capture high-resolution images that take full advantage of the camera's high quality Carl Zeiss® lens. Advanced processing technology reduces noise and graininess for incredibly crisp, clear images - even in challenging low-light conditions. Share instantly with Wi-fi WiFi lets you quickly upload photos and videos to social media sites through your WiFi smartphone or tablet, back them up on a network-connected PC, or view them on your compatible large screen TV. Crisp, beautiful HD videos Record crystal-clear movies in high-resolution with HD 1080/60i AVCHD™ video capture1. Stunning, fast motion video with reduced distortion looks great when played back on your HDTV2. Notice a perfect photo op while shooting video? With dual record of stills and movies, you can shoot both at the same time. Big-time battery life Never miss the perfect shot due to a dead battery. The Cyber-shot WX300 camera features long-lasting, extended battery life so you can capture up to 500 photos on a single charge and shoot nearly all day without a worry. It's perfect for traveling or shooting photos while you're out and about. Say goodbye to blur Sony's Optical SteadyShot™ image stabilization with Active Mode gives you the freedom to shoot movies even while walking or running³. 2-way Active Mode corrects for both vertical and horizontal motion. 
Product description and full feature list Explore the full range of features and options below. 
Enhanced Superior Auto
Enhanced Superior Auto supports scenes with dynamic motion to provide beautiful results even in dark situations. The result is clearer images with less blur.

Capture the decisive 
moment with up to 10fps
Capture full 18.2 megapixel resolution images at up to 10 frames per second, helping to ensure that the decisive moment is captured such as the soccer ball flying into the goal. In addition, a mechanical shutter helps reduce distortion when continuously shooting moving subjects.



Creative shooting with
Picture and Beauty effects
Picture Effect adds a new level of expression to photos, making ordinary landscapes and portraits come to life by heightening mood and emphasizing certain attributes. Beauty Effects allows edits to skin tones, skin smoothing, shine removal, eye widening, and teeth whitening. Beauty Effects can be combined to further enhance the image.



Intelligent Sweep Panorama™ 
mode-up to 360°
Intelligent Sweep Panorama mode takes our Sweep Panorama function to the next level with the addition of motion compensation. Even when subjects are moving in the foreground of your landscape, these cameras can detect faces and moving subjects, intelligently stitching different widths together to minimize distortion. Simply press the shutter button and sweep the camera in the desired direction and the camera continuously shoots at a high speed, then seamlessly stitches the images together with automatic position adjustment to create one stunning panoramic image. Available in wide and up to 360° full circle, the camera can take a variety of panoramic shots.




1. Records in 29 minute segments

2. Requires HDTV and HDMI cable sold separately

3. Combined with electronic stabilization
